title: Jesus, Thy Boundless Love to Me

verses.html:
1
Jesus, Thy boundless love to me
No tho’t can reach, no tongue declare;
Oh, knit my thankful heart to Thee
And reign without a rival there:

verses.label: 1C
verses.html:
1
Thine wholly, Thine alone, I am;
Be Thou alone my constant flame.

2
Oh, grant that nothing in my soul
May dwell but Thy pure love alone;
Oh, may Thy love possess me whole,
My joy, my treasure, and my crown:

verses.label: 2C
verses.html:
2
All coldness from my heart remove;
May ev’ry act, word, thought, be love.

3
O Love, how gracious is Thy way!
All fear before Thy presence flies;
Care, anguish, sorrow melt away,
Where’er Thy healing beams arise:

verses.label: 3C
verses.html:
3
O Jesus, nothing may I see,
Nothing desire, or seek, but Thee.
